title: Total Cars Available
description: FleetGo offers over 120+ well-maintained, regularly serviced vehicles ready for rent, ensuring a smooth and safe ride for every customer.

title: Years in Service
description: Serving customers since 2017, FleetGo has built a reputation for reliability and customer satisfaction over 7+ successful years.

title: Happy Customers
description: With over 10,000 successful bookings, FleetGo is trusted by thousands of satisfied customers across the country.

title: Cities Covered
description: FleetGo operates in 15+ major cities nationwide, offering easy, reliable, and affordable car rentals wherever you go.
